name: Last Pilot - GMTK GameJam 2020 Entry
description:
Instructions

You are the last pilot against an Alien Invasion, but ship is malfunctioning and glitchy

Move: Arrows / WASD

Shoot: SPACE

Credits

Player Ship: Kenney's Space Kit

Environment: LowPoly Environment Pack By Korveen in Unity Asset Store

JMO and Synty Particles on Unity Asset Store

Enemies and Base: https://emerald-eel-entertainment.itch.io/

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/space-shooter-music
